Hero.Title: Дизайн интерьера
Hero.Text: Мы предлагаем вам отличный комфорт и прекрасный дизайн в ремонте квартир.
Hero.Live: Следуйте за нами в прямом эфире
Hero.LineText: Мы счастливы сделать ваш дом мечты реальностью

About.Title: About us
About.Text: Welcome to Imarat group. We are a passionate team of design h dedicated to delivering excellence in every project. Our main goal is to understand and cater to each client's needs, providing exceptional design services tailored to their vision At Imarat group, we consider ourselves pioneers in design, always pushing boundaries and seeking the latest trends. Our team, consisting of industry experts and creative minds, is here to leave a lasting impact on every project we undertake. Choose us for a collaborative and visionary design journey.
About.Team: we have experienced professionals in our team.

OurTeam.Title: We’ve got an entire team dedicated to supporting you and your business

OurServices.Title: Наши услуги
OurServices.Text: Мы предоставляем лучшие услуги для наших клиентов

Minimalism.Title: Minimalism
Minimalism.Text: Our Minimalism service offers sleek, functional designs with an emphasis on space and simplicity, delivering serene, uncluttered environments

HighTech.Title: High Tech
HighTech.Text: Our High Tech service delivers futuristic, efficient designs with a focus on innovative technology and sleek aesthetics

Modern.Title: Modern
Modern.Text: Our Modern service provides contemporary, stylish designs, emphasizing clean lines and functional elegance.

Contemporary.Title: Contemporary
Contemporary.Text: Our Contemporary service offers dynamic, up-to-date designs that combine current trends with timeless functionality

Classical.Title: Classical
Classical.Text: Classical interior design features intricate furniture, luxurious materials like marble and fine textiles, and a balanced, symmetrical layout
